name: HypnoTherapist
0:
”Alexa, launch hypno therapist”
”I want to relax”
”Make me sleep now”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hypno therapist
Developer Terms of Use
des:
I'm Barry Thain. I'm a Clinical Hypnotist with more than 25 years of experience in private practice, including eight years with the UK National Health Service. I have treated thousands of people from all over the world, for a wide range of physiological and psychological issues, from Acne to Zoophobia.
 
Therapeutic hypnotism is best done in person, when your specific circumstances can be accommodated. I have recorded some hypnotherapy protocols that you can experience with this Alexa skill in your home, in case personal therapy isn’t possible.
 
This is not a substitute for mainstream medical care. If you have pressing problems, please consult your physician. While you are waiting for your appointment my hypnotherapies will not do you any harm, and have done many people much good. There are no pills, no scalpels, and no trawling through your past; just a quiet communication between my subconscious mind and yours to help you feel better about yourself, and better within yourself.
 
I offer six full, free therapies in this skill. You can enjoy unlimited access to all my 70+ therapies with a monthly subscription or purchase a bundle of ten hypnotherapy sessions of your choice. Say "List All" to get the latest library of therapies sent to your Alexa app.

You are welcome to contact me - bt@mindsci-clinic.com or +44 (0)7788 130082 - to discuss personal therapy, or with any suggestions to enhance this Alexa service.

I hope you will enjoy your hypnotherapy. But, please, DO NOT listen to these therapies while you are driving or in any other situation where it would be hazardous for you to sleep.
 
 Barry Thain PDCHyp MBSCH
 Your hypno therapist
 
TO ENJOY FREE HYPNOTHERAPIES:
“Alexa ... Launch the hypno therapist”.
 Then, you can say:
 “I want to relax” or “Make me sleep now”
